website_summaries.verdict: Apple's true wireless AirPods Pro earphones are vastly superior to the standard model, with solid noise cancellation, quality audio performance, and a far better in-ear fit that justifies the extra cost.

customer_reviews.title: Try it, but don’t have high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I would have thought Apple might have created something better. Sound? is ok, but not excellent. Ease to use? Too complicated Battery? Better then it’s predecessor, but not great. Value for money? Overpriced I think. Would I recommend it? Maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: Hitz

customer_reviews.title: Just great headphones
customer_reviews.text: - Noise cancellation is great for planes etc - Transparency is great for sport, hear your teammates while listening to music - it’s actually OP for skiing (on transparency mode) - I always forget its in my ear - replaces my Bose
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: They're "OK"
customer_reviews.text: As a regular consumer, I am not an audiophile but for £250 I expected more. Firstly, as someone who has never experienced noise cancelling before - this is "OK" at best, but it definitely does NOT block out alot of sound. It tones down things like AC Units and constant drones - but you can CLEARLY hear people chatting and keyboards typing away if using it in an office environment. I find the right ear pod quite painful after a while too. The sound quality is OK but I expected to be blown away for £250. They're not much better than regular wired iphone headphones - it's more the in-ear insulation that makes it sound better.
customer_reviews.author: K A

customer_reviews.text: These are a brilliant product. I originally had the 1st generation AirPods, but didn’t see the point in getting the 2nd generation as they aren’t much different. As soon as they were announced I wanted them from the get-go. Overall, they didn’t disappoint. They’ve got really good sound, amazing ANC and I think they’re a better design than previous models too. If you’ve got the money I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Pilling

customer_reviews.title: High quality and effective noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant, the noise cancellation is better than expected with a discreet and comfortable fit. Perfect all-rounder
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit and there poor sound
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit my ears. Standard AirPods do and subsequently sound better!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: A worthy upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I’ve enjoyed using the original Airpods for the last couple of years, but needed third party silicon tips so that they would stay in my ears (Apple buds never stay in for me) This is the first time Apple buds have fit me properly and the sound quality is on par with other buds of similar price range and better than the old ones. A worthy upgrade to the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON FIRST ..OK??!!
customer_reviews.text: Apple's official website had a two-week wait. Amazon delivered NEXT DAY!!! This is the THIRD product that has arrived at Amazon, even BEFORE it get to Apple's own website!! WOW!!! Now, isn't that amaz...ing And WOW to the item and the sound quality too> So easy to operate and works an absolute treat. HIGHLY recommended ...as is Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Fg 81.5.8

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish and average sound
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good battery, but sound quality I feel could be a little better. They’re also not massively loud but I guess that’s good to protect my hearing
customer_reviews.author: William Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I had some of the first generation AirPods and have been waiting for these to come back into stock on Amazon, as soon as they were in I ordered them. These are far superior to the originals, the fit is snugger, helped by the three different sized changeable buds. The best thing with Apple products is they work together seamlessly, open bluetooth on your iPhone, hold the case nearby and that is it, simple. Soundwise, the volume is louder than the originals but most impressive is the noise cancelling, pop them in your ears without any music playing and all background noise just disappears. Price wise, a little on the expensive side but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shenton

customer_reviews.title: faced many bugs
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems with these air pods, mainly Bluetooth connectivity, got replacements for them, still facing the same problem, when listening to music, the song sometimes suddenly starts breaking up (usually happens when I open apps on the phone) and the song keeps breaking up until I either turn off the app or turn the Bluetooth off and back on again.
customer_reviews.author: Nika Avdalov

customer_reviews.title: Very overrated
customer_reviews.text: Very very overrated. I've got a pair of £300 B&O H7s which are a magnitude better than these. These feel plasticy, sound like a pair of £40 Sennheisers and are definitely not worth the money in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Batts

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that performance of airpods pro will justify the price. And with relief I can say that I didn't waste my money. Since I've connected them to my iphone I can't stop listening to all my favourtie tracks. Reviews I've read/watched were mixed but I took a chance and I don't regret it. And in full honesty earphones started to be really pricy like everything else so...yeah it's still 250 quid but I have loudness and range I wanted. My phone is in the kitchen while I chill on sofa and there's no problems. Audio is blasting on max volume just how I like it. I couldn't find anything that loud since my Iphone3GS (RIP) Happy days!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor value for money. Not great for gym, great for everything else
customer_reviews.text: Pro: - Noise Cancellation is great - Comfortable in ear - Easy pairing with iPhone (do need to manually switch if you have them paired to more than one phone for example work phone and personal phone) Cons: - Make a annoying noise if youre wearing a hat/hood and they rub against the hood - Not great for the gym as they still fall out whenever you're jogging/engaging in exercises such as crunches, rotational cable row - Sounds quality is nowhere as good as the wf-1000xm3 which are cheaper - Doesn't seem to connect to my Mac or iPad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not convinced
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of excellent reviews and they have noise cancellation. I found that none of the interchangeable tips resulted in a pass for the built in seal test. I personally do not find the sound quality to be much better than the previous pods that I also have - certainly nowhere close to budget over ear headphones. The ear seal means that for me these are less comfortable than the previous pods - if I push them in far enough for noise cancellation to work (a bit) then I get ear pain after half an hour at most.
customer_reviews.author: AJB

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling is good, used it on a flight and it helped. Not as good as over ear but decent. Battery life was the main point of concern but this was not an issue, the travel time was 17 hours and the charge in the case was still 50% even though i had them in almost the whole time. Pairing with an iphone is simplicity itself, pairing with my laptop not so much. Call quality is good on the phone, but for laptop and conference calls it could be better hence the 4 stars. As music headphones go they are meh, but these are for being out and about and do the job, use decent headphones for home.
customer_reviews.author: Nath

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I also have sennheiser true momentum wireless headphone and in comparison these are not quite as good in terms of sound and comfort. The problem I have is that my left ear is a different shape to my right so have always had problems with in ear headphones and these are no different. The sound and noise cancellation is fantastic but I just can’t get the left one to stay in even having tried all the tips. Unfortunately because of this I had to send them back. For me the sennheisers are in a different league.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, they’re rubbish!
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish! Utter rubbish! Used these when watching TV and they were decent enough. BUT noises in the room actually echoed in each pod and disturbed the enjoyment so much I’m returning them. Siri only seemed to work when connected to my iPhone. With my Bose Freesport, although not noise cancelling, there is at least volume control on them for connection to any device. For me, these are a design catastrophe and I’d never pay nearly £250 for them ever again. Very, very poor indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great but with a major flaw for calls
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great and first time I’ve used noise cancelling headphones - really impressed! Battery life questionable - not sure if the quoted figures stack up as struggled to get 3.5hrs before needing to recharge even when noise cancelling turned off. However the biggest issue is the quality of the microphone when using to make/receive calls - the other user cannot make or anything said unless in a completely silent environment. Having read some of the Apple forums since, this appears to be a common issue and really needs to be addressed given the price point for these headphones! Have opted to return the headphones - consider what sacrifices you want to make before buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones - let down by ANC after software updates
customer_reviews.text: Now I love these, I run with them, do works calls, personal calls etc and they fit brilliantly! When I got them (2019) they were new-ish out and the ANC was brilliant, however, for some reason unknown to anyone recent firmware upgrade have left this feature somewhat disappointing (good it there is a LOT of info out there), to prove the point I have had these replaced by apple twice under warranty for the ANC being less effective and they have admitted that this is an issue with firmware after the second replacement, So I am hoping to get an update soon where they sort it back out because the hardware can clearly do it!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Frampton

customer_reviews.title: They do everything I need from in the ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Having owned and used these pro pods for a few months I remain impressed with their capabilities. Features are easy to use, They feel very comfortable to wear for long hours and stay connected via Bluetooth without interruption. Charging is easy and they last for ages, the shortest power length occurring if you use the noise cancelling feature, which is very good for something just in the ear and not over them. I really like them and they do everything I need. Yet another fab product from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but a tad pricey if u r not seriously into your tunes
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound, and super easy to setup. No complaints. Wasn’t sure if the pods magnetically ‘clicked’ in place in the case, as details did not say, but they do. Pros: Good sound Small case Sit in ear really well Super easy to set up I can use my excising apple charging cable Noise cancellation good, and nice to be able to turn off Cons: Price Touch control can be a little fiddly to get used to at first - might have been better on the pod it instead of the stick
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I seen a review about someone getting fake AirPods from ordering this but I had no problem very high quality bead phones from Apple that are great to flex the noise cancellation is good for in ear buds but my favourite part about the airpod pros are the transparency mode wich is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Apple users
customer_reviews.text: If you have an iPhone, iPad, MacBook or any other Apple product you should get these earbuds. Not because they are the most inexpensive truly wireless earbuds on the market (they clearly aren’t) but the experience of using them is second to none. That being said, the sound quality is obviously not the best, but it doesn’t need to be as you are not paying for high quality sound (even though they still sound good), you are paying for Apple quality which comes with convenience and compatibility across all devices. At first I was reluctant due to the price but I believe they are honestly worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Best active noise cancelling wireless earbuds on the market
customer_reviews.text: Coming from the bose QC20s I'm impressed the by active noise cancelling of the airpods pro. Its so good that I actually sometimes use it to sleep when its noisy - shame the low battery noise comes on a few hours later. Sound quality isn't as good as the bose but I can't really complain since its so small. Anyways this went beyond my expectations. One thing to note is that the mic is good enough for phone calls, but its terrible for discord or zoom calls.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loving these AirPods Pro. I had the original AirPods for years and they finally started to give up on me. Didn’t really have the money to replace them so bought very cheap wireless earphones. Big mistake and they soon were returned. I bit the bullet and purchased these. Oh wow definitely get what you pay for. The noise cancellation is great. Sound quality and comfort is great too. I use these everyday running or walking to work and no problems. Haven’t fallen out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality wise they’re fine. They are good. Nothing amazing but in my opinion once you reach a certain level of quality you can’t tell much difference. I’ve never found super expensive headphones to be worth it. Noise cancellation is fantastic for drowning out background noise. It’s not full cancellation, you can still hear bits and bobs sometimes but it’s good overall. When I take the cancellation off after a while all the background noises seem so extremely loud that it hurts. Proving the cancellation is good since you get so used to the quiet. They are basically the same as AirPods or the regular wired ones but it makes a huge different being able to cut out background noise.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: So, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I treated myself to the original AirPods a few years ago, and loved them for their portability. I have autism and sensory processing issues, so they meant I could always pop some noise or music on if I was stressing out in a shop, and that I could hear phone calls more clearly. Upgrading to the Pro seemed extravagant but they really are great. The noise cancelling even with no music on is noticeable, the sound quality is good, and although I didn't have significant fit issues with the original, the option to change the tips on these is appreciated. If you love the original AirPods and are considering an upgrade this is really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzylou

customer_reviews.title: Better stick to regular AirPods
customer_reviews.text: What annoys me the most if when I unintentionally touch the external part of them, they make this chirp sound that is so annoying that I can feel it in my teeth, it’s like if someone was scratching a whiteboard. I was expecting more from Apple. My advice to you stick to the old AirPods, gestures and user experience were better. Also no matter what I do or how do I adjust them this things are so invasive and at the same time they keep falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound quality, easy to set up, comfortable to wear, so lightweight. I have some over-the-ear headphones with noise cancellation which I love, but these pods are a revelation. I got them so I could walk along whilst listening to my audiobooks. I think I may save my headphones for in-house stereo listening. Best of both worlds...though the pods would be excellent for both! My only gripe is the fiddly controls. Takes some finesse and getting used to. I’m not sure if my ‘transparent mode’ is working properly, where you hold the button down to listen to ambient noise...but I will persevere.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a gym fanatic. I'm in there most days. My gym is great! Good kit and really friendly staff. However, there is one problem. They blast awful music at ridiculous volume all the time. I've even tried industrial ear defenders with built in Bluetooth to defeat the dire music but to no avail. I want to choose what music I listen to when working out! I don't like having the choice made for me. So I thought I'd take the plunge and buy the Apple AirPods. To my joy they work! They work beautifully! Worth every penny. They've massively improved my gym experience.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth upgrading to and much better fit
customer_reviews.text: I have the previous AirPods but had to buy silicone extensions as otherwise they wouldn’t stay in my ear and I certainly couldn’t have done any exercise - obviously that was a pain when charging, needing to use quickly etc. Deciding to treat myself given the working from home rules I thought I’d try these as they looked like they may fit without extensions, and offered noise cancellation. A couple of days in and what a huge difference! Adjustable to fit my non-standard Apple ears without faffing around with extras, decent noise cancellation, and easy to use. I think they’re worth the upgrade even with the latest predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: W00dsy5150

customer_reviews.title: Average Sound, phenomenal otherwise. ( UPDATED)
customer_reviews.text: • Average sound quality ( found the wired airpods which come with iPhones a bit fuller) • Go for Powerbeats Pro if you care about sound. • However, ease of use and noise cancelation are industry leading. • The case has a nice heft to it and the pods look absolutely beautiful. • Choose wisely. UPDATE 24/6/20 Massive improvement in sound quality, i guess apple pushed a firmware update.
customer_reviews.author: Aman Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the reviews suggest.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these would exceed my expectations, sadly they didn’t. The noise cancelling feature just doesn’t work, and I’m starting to think it’s a fault rather than the norm. You get a feature where you can see if you get a fit for the buds, I’ve tried all 3 sizes and none of them fit the bill for my right ear. This is the root of the problem with the noise cancellation I think. They may be going back. A quick update.......... They have gone back. The noise cancellation packed in on the right hand side, not good for a set of earphones costing this much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: Average sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you are an iPhone user. The setup is a breeze. Didn’t realise upon setup the AirPods get linked to your Apple ID which makes sharing them with your partner not so simple. Sound quality is average, battery life is below average, however call quality is absolutely fantastic. The ANC works well but doesn’t cut everything like headphones. Transparency mode also works well and is a boon when taking calls. I just wish Apple improved the battery life and bass in the next version. Not sure it’s worth £250.
customer_reviews.author: Superfox

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones however they don’t fit my ears as well as the normal apple headphones (I find they often fall out), despite the new three sizes. However, really like the noise cancelling feature
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Great but the ear tips need to be memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I like them and their integration with my iPhone and Apple Watch. Bluetooth range is great I can leave the phone in the lounge and still use them in every room in the house and even at the bottom of the garden. One star dropped because the noise cancelling aspect and sound quality is affected by poor sealing silicone ear tips. I have had to order memory foam replacements to ensure a good seal these should come as standard because looking at blogs this is not an isolated experience
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use with great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after trying the highly rated Sony wf-1000xm3 and struggling to get anywhere with them (sound reproduction was terrible with distortion everywhere) so they were returned. The AirPod Pros, in comparison, were like a breath of fresh air, they just worked out of the box giving a highly detailed sound stage even before they have burnt in. Range is really good (working easily two rooms away) and I haven’t had any problems with call quality. Thoroughly recommended if you have an iPhone/iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Not for everyone. I can hear that the sound quality is excellent and the noise cancellation does work- but it really depends if you find ear plug/in ear headphones comfortable. These go a lot deaper in than the traditional wired ones or the previous generation ones. They also effectively create a seal. I tried all the settings but still wasn’t comfortable with the pressure in my ear. So returned them and went for the previous generation of airpods which I found to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but the fit is not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Had classic AirPods and lived them so much thought these would be brilliant. Sadly, no matter how much I tried to convince myself, I just didn’t find them comfortable with any of the 3 different sized silicone plugs I tried. I think these are really for the people that don’t like the fit of the original shaped AirPods, so I’m getting the AirPods 2 instead. Have to applaud Amazon - posted the return today and already have a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Worst fit ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because of the noise cancellation feature as the music at the gym is too loud and it worked great, however, for such a pricey pair of earbuds, the fit needs to be dramatically improved. They won't stop falling out of my ears. I usually do a lot of running, weight lifting and crossfit training and I have tried changing the bud size and even wearing them upside down and nothing works. They have been a huge disappointment and I am returning them. If you engage into vigorous physical activity I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Apple AirPod Pro
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant purchasing as I have always had problems with finding in ears fit, but reading others had good experiences I took the chance and I couldn't been happier. They fit really nicely, no problem them falling out and best of all, sound quality is just up there. Very satisfied with them. The noise cancelling is not blowing you away but didn't expect that, and with music in my ears I am not too worried. Expensive yes, but this is Apple :)
customer_reviews.author: Kjell Henning Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Phonecalls = awesome, music not so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for phone calls and plane trips to listen to music. For the phone calls they are the best, clear and seamless with an iPhone. For music, I'm sorry but I'm clearly spoilt with using higher end in the past, these just sound weak and muddy. Considering the price, I sent them back and will be using music headphones and cheaper earbuds for calls. ANC works and if you've never used it, they will impress you. If you've used something like the Sony WX1000M3, you'll hear the difference, it's passable ANC.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have imagined
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been very pleasantly surprised with just how good these earphones are. So easy to set up with superb easy to use features. I’ve owned numerous high end earphones from Shure 846 & 500, Sennheiser IE800, B&O E8 and Klipsh X10i. Whilst these are all great earphones the Apple AirPods offer so many top features and ease of use plus a pretty damn good sound to boot. The bonuses are top quality noise cancelling and high output volumes. In built microphone for calls is also a top feature.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGlynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and functions
customer_reviews.text: After having the AirPods 2 and these I actually wear the two more but these are nice and the sound is amazing and like the the way switches from ANC to Transparently mode very handy and will be keeping them in call mode excellent and battery last a fair time to the size and weight you can put in pocket and connectivity brilliant price wise a little over priced perhaps but there apple and if you have iPhone like me work amazing so would recommend only down side for me is the tips in ear but still brill at what they do
customer_reviews.author: k sherman

customer_reviews.title: They’re ight
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling and transparency option is useful. They fit very nice in the ear and are comfortable, although my left side particularly comes loose and falls out my ears sometimes, damaged the exterior slightly due to them falling off onto concrete. Sound closely resembles the standard AirPods with slightly better bass, not overly impressed. As for the price point I don’t think these small and easy to lose earbuds are worth that much money... sorry apple... or should I be the one apologised to?
customer_reviews.author: Varisha

customer_reviews.title: Kept falling out
customer_reviews.text: Great earbuds but would not fit my ears no matter what tips i used. Tried to love them but they had to go back. Great sound when you do get a seal but not worth the effort each time putting them in. Will stick to my Cambridge Melomanias even though they do not have al the features but at least you can stick them in and forget about them. If ordinary apple earphones do not fit you then neither will these.
customer_reviews.author: Neal R

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect for the money, but still great.
customer_reviews.text: Benefits over standard AirPods: 1) Noise Cancellation 2) Smaller 3) longer battery life 4) tighter fit Downsides vs standard AirPods: 1) Charging case is a lot bigger 2) not a standard USB charging cable therefore you need to already have or need to buy the latest Apple plug, which for £250 you would expect to get included.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed. At first I thought they are pretty good (although overpriced). But the more I used them the more I noticed any of the ear bud sizes just wont stay in my ear. They glide out especially when sweating and don’t sit nicely. They even hurt me after a while. I got smaller ears so I guess they are not suitable for them. Noise cancellation is ok but def expected more from Apple - especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shari S.

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: The sound of these small things is nothing short of amazing. Great battery life. Great for teleconference calls (the microphones are top quality indeed. I'm now enjoying my runs a lot more (with the transparency mode turned on to hear what's going on around me) and vacuum cleaning the house (with noise-cancellation on to block external sounds). They don't come off even when I am doing kettlebell workouts. I cannot wait to test the spatial 3D audio feature that is coming with next update of the OS.
customer_reviews.author: amsterdamgroove

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got the Apple AirPods Pro's following a failure of some other earbuds, the sound quality is superb and I'm hearing things in my music I hadn't heard previously. Noise cancellation is brilliant, as is the ability to switch to talk through etc. Siri works really well too and everything is right with these. I'll use them more and give an update later as I get more into them, but thus far, really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Andy P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all-round wireless earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: The best wireless earbuds on the market in my opinion. There are others that may do certain things better but these are great in nearly every aspect. They fit great, the noise cancellation is excellent, no issues with battery life, clean aesthetic. They will sound great to most people unless they are a bass-head or an avid audiophile. These are getting an update soon to support automatic device switching between apple products and that is something you won't get from any other device. I was worried when I purchased these that they just weren't worth the money but I have been proven wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tony H.

customer_reviews.title: Warning : Sent Used AirPods
customer_reviews.text: Product ordered from Amazon directly. What I received was clearly second-hand (battered and opened box), registered to someone called “Tom” and only had one set of the silicone buds (should come with three). Please be careful ordering as nowhere did it say the item was used and the price certainly did not reflect that. Don’t really want to be sticking something in my ear which has been in someone else’s.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mason

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing I’ve got a set of AirPods and some beats studio noise cancelling headphones but the pros are just amazing they fit perfectly in my Ears and the noise cancelling is the best I’ve ever used I can’t hear nothing just the music the sound quality is really good with a lot more bass compared to the original AirPods as they lack bass but the pros don’t they are pricey but there definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: C nash

customer_reviews.title: Crackling  after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted and excited to receive these and was very happy with the product for the first couple of months. Unfortunately, the left ear started crackling at that point and is getting worse. i am not trying to get a replacement but I understand from friends that they have got replacements and had the same issue. My son got the Sony WF-1000XM3 Noise Cancelling which have been great and have better sounds quality.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: What you’d expect from Apple!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my husband- he loves them! He wears them to take work calls and has said he often forgets he has them in. The charge on them doesn’t last very long apparently, but the charging case is very good
customer_reviews.author: Kam M

customer_reviews.title: Actually quite good
customer_reviews.text: Really Pleased, Definitely worth the price to most iPhone users. I have been a Bose earphone advocate ever since I was in a position to purchase some slightly ‘nicer’ earphones, having had a few pairs of wired bose and then a three month old pair of wireless ones battery give up on me I decided to give these a go and honestly I’m glad I did the noise cancellation rivals that of even the qc35 ii, and transparency mode is excellent for when out and about. The fit is much better and more comfortable for me than that of the normal AirPods or buds included with the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Jono

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money spend with honey.
customer_reviews.text: when I bought was excited but after I used feel regrated why u bought Noise cancellation? its give me pain in my head when I wear may be different from others.battery life as they said its worst than previous versions. don't waste your money better take ur love one dinner and enjoy your time.
customer_reviews.author: Kamrulslam

customer_reviews.title: Since Sliced Bread
customer_reviews.text: I have weird ears (difficult ear canal openings) but the idea of in ear buds have always made sense to me for external sound cancellation. Similar ones bought off the shelf by me, have sort of worked but this high end Apple version,...oh..my...god. They really do exceed expectations to someone who went across to Apple having been in the the Android dark side for years. Proper test? Try them on a John Deere ride-on mower listening to 'the Archers' on a Sunday morning for 2 hours and then tell me they don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Tolstoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Great sound. Good Apple.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my existing AirPods, was a bit hesitant at first as mine worked fine but the upgrade was well worth it. Noise cancelling is a really great feature - amazing to use in loud public areas. I was going to buy these directly from Apple as I normally do when buying an Apple product but to find these on here with a discount and next day Prime delivery I really couldn’t turn them down. They arrived on time, factory sealed just as they would come from Apple - but with the addition of the smiley face on the box :) If you are thinking about these and have an Apple device, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Catterall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they’re easily transported around in your pocket and battery life is brilliant. Sound quality is high, day to day you won’t notice. Noise cancellation may not be incredible but I really like the way it removes all the standard background noise such as bus engines, carriage noise. Some things will creep through, such as children screaming. But consistent noises will be cancelled out. Volume control is by Siri or on phone and I have no problems with this.
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely INSANE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely insane! For half the size of normal AirPods and only £50 more than wireless charging AirPods 2nd gen, these are worth the purchase. Noise cancelling is brilliant with only small sounds coming through and transparency mode is probably my favourite feature as it sounds as if you never had them in your ear! The speaker grill itself is double or more the size of normal AirPods as well! Form factor + sound quality definitely make it worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Southworth

customer_reviews.title: Not for music lovers!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you have a lot of spare money to pay for a basic Bluetooth headset to make calls. If you love music then you will seriously be disappointed... big time. The noise cancellation is brilliant! It’s brilliant for phone calls. I honestly expected so much more. Battery isn’t amazing either. The small earbud fit me perfectly... 4 days later it’s too loose. I actually checked the serial code for them online to make sure they were genuine. On the plus side... at least you can show off to strangers the fact that you can afford expensive basic stuff. Overall... not bad... but definitely not anything above good.
customer_reviews.author: LeeC

customer_reviews.title: Fall out all the time ....
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is I really wanted to love them, but I just could not get them to stay in my ears. I tried all the different type of fits but none of them worked and for the very short period they dis stay in I was disappointed with the sound quality. On the plus side the phone would confirm that the seal to your ear is not correct, but ai already knew this. I would say my ears are of average to large size.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but caused me earache and headaches! Reluctantly returned.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design, and perfect integration within Apple ecosystem. I wear headphones at work for 5+ hours a day at work and take 4-6 flights a month. Have used Bose QC20s (and QC35s at home) religiously, and finally thought I’d found the right wireless upgrade. Really wanted to love them, but unfortunately they gave me bad earache within a few minutes, and headaches when wearing for more than 30 minutes. For now have settled for Sony WF-1000MX3 - good noise cancellation and great sound quality, but poor call quality and lacking the finesse and seamless connectivity with multiple devices. Hoping the AirPods Pro II don’t hurt my ears!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling is really good
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of apple products but apart from noise cancelling and size the originals were actually not bad. Not sure if it was worth it over the originals but overall still good. The noise cancelling works very well, My top case is slightly loose which is a little strange
customer_reviews.author: R. Parmar

customer_reviews.title: Sound: 4* Everything else: 5*
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, but I have had a hell of a lot better. However, every thing else about these is 5*. Form factor, comfort, connectivity, noise cancelling, wireless charging, I can’t fault any of it. If 4 and half stars was possible I would have rated because it’s all perfect but the sound could have been better for the money (I’m an ex sound engineer so I am picky!)
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Been looking forward to getting these for a while now and they haven't disappointed. Noise cancellation is excellent as is the sound quality. Very impressed all round.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I have had a few budget headphones & while they were sufficient they were no comparison to these. Budget headphones had a horrible buzz when not playing music, so you couldn’t wear them with no sound or you felt like you have tinnitus. These are super comfortable. You can choose between noise cancellation when working in the gym or being able to hear what’s going on around you for safety when on the street.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rapson

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: Over all these are brilliant. Unfortunately for me, the left one kept coming loose to the point of almost falling out so I was constantly readjusting it. It happened so much I had to send them back. I had tried all the different tips and positions but they just weren’t meant for my ears. I will go back to the 1st generation as I never had an issue with them.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good sound & comfortable & fantastic being wireless.
customer_reviews.text: After reading countless reviews of the AirPod Pro I decided to go ahead & purchase.Good decision I feel & no regrets.The sound quality is of high quality without saying awesome which would be an exaggeration in my opinion ,so keeping it real here.I use them for just around the house really ,& out jogging or walking.They fit snug in my ears, & have never popped out,wether jogging,walking or rolling about the hay in the house 😂 Great feature & major selling point for me was the wireless feature of Airpods so that is the fantastic part about them.In short I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: GRocafella

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: make sure you try the different sizes of tips. i found that i needed the large size , both in terms of staying in my ear and in terms of noise cancellation, instead of the medium size that i need with every other brand. when you do use the perfect size for you these buds are eerily quiet.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: There are many reviews on how amazing AirPod Pros are and I'm so pleased I purchased them. Buying through Amazon was extremely straightforward and quick - as with everything Amazon. At the time they were down to £220, bought them and they arrived the next day. I can't go a day without them. Amazing purchase, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Heath

customer_reviews.title: Definitely better than normal AirPods
customer_reviews.text: I was upgrading from the 1st gen AirPods and I wasn’t expecting the sound quality to be much different but I was so wrong. They’re way better than normal AirPods and the noise cancellation is really cool and helps make the songs sound better. The transparency mode is also good for if you’re trying to listen to the background noise for example while you’re running you should be able to hear cars and etc. You can also change the size of the buds as Apple supply three different sizes in the box. Wasn’t expecting to be this impressed by these. Good job Apple!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to see what all the hype was about with these things but I have to admit I am pleasantly surprised. Paired with an ipad, I can set my music on and then wander around the house quite easily without losing signal. The sound quality is amazing, watching a movie I could hear background noises like birds tweeting and everything is crisp. Not sure about noise cancelling as I can still hear background noise, even with changing the size of the ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Miss L E Minier

customer_reviews.title: They fall out!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a refund, via the warranty, as these air pods are not fit for purpose. They keep falling out, even though ive tried every size of tip and every angle of putting them in. Even sitting still and eating they fall out. I see this is a common problem. Apple can’t fix this and advised me to check my warranty for a refund. Says it all really.
customer_reviews.author: S. G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Superb integration with Apple's ecosystem
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, folks, what do you expect? If you're into Apple kit, these earbuds provide a seamless experience connecting with your devices. Sound quality is excellent, although obviously not as good as a dedicated pair of over-the-ear cans. My only criticism is that Siri can take several seconds to wake up—much slower than Siri on my iPhone. Battery life is decent and even if it runs out on a heavy listening session, five minutes in the charging case gets you an hour of listening time. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Stobie

customer_reviews.title: Just works and Beautiful sound Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love them they are beautiful and they sound loud and clear and they connect seamlessly with all my Apple products = one set of headphones for all my Apple devices, I've tried all the other earphones and to be honest none of them are anywhere near this good, I know they're expensive but the Quality is worth it. Im in love
customer_reviews.author: rhodyate

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling is good for such small buds but not as good as I though it would be, but the main issue is they hurt my ears after a few hours so have returned. medium tips fell out ( and hurt ) large tips gave a good seal but hurt more. call quality wasnt that great in noisier environments.
customer_reviews.author: stu75

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive and they fall out
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that spoils these is the fact that unassisted they fall out of my ears. This is regardless of what size bud I use. To make them even workable I had to buy some AHASTYLE AirPods Pro Ear Hooks (available on Amazon) but for the price I shouldn’t have had to. This seems to be a very bad design from Apple and personally I wouldn’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Eisenheim

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly average - not at all what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old Bose ‘in ear’ are much better in every way which is surprising. Noise cancellation is frankly poor and the base and tone of the music lacks ‘punch’. Maybe my ears are tuned to the more involving nature of my Bose, but ‘meh’ is an honest review. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: SayItAsYouSeeIt

customer_reviews.title: You need these in your life
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, sound quality, battery life, styling the lot! Worth the cash. If I lost mine, I would buy another set tomorrow, just can’t do without them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Trainer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality, nice bass , amazing noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed honestly. I’ve been using AirPods for 3 years already and I was satisfied but the AirPods Pro are really an upgrade that’s worth doing. I was sceptical but after testing them I consider I’ve done the right choice. Bought them from Amazon as new ,on a better price than Apple store .
customer_reviews.author: Cristian B

customer_reviews.title: good all round earbuds
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is good, noice cancelation is good(not as good as over ears headphones but still good enough). quite effective for flights, fits ok in my ears and they stay there not like the regular airpods the overall package (size, built quality, sound, Active noice cancelation) is good wish the battery lasted a bit longer than 4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Doru Moise

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but they would not stay in my ears! Look good, sound good, noise cancelling not bad, fit not good! What a shame! Item returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Read lots of reviews on these and took the plunge and ordered some, yes they are expensive but the NC is brilliant for in ear phones, and the simple switching between devices is something Apple does very well. Size is perfect to carry in your pocket so you can take them everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Jon A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - they just work well
customer_reviews.text: These are just as you might expect. They work very well with the iPhone and iPad, sound pretty good, have excellent sound cancelling and the transparent mode is perfect for cycling and listening to music. All in all I am delighted with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jeff J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Different league
customer_reviews.text: I care a lot about my earphones as I use them lots during the day. Listening to music, podcasts and making phone calls. I travel on the tube a lot and the noise cancellation is a real lifesaver. As you'd expect they operate without flaw within the Apple ecosystem. Expensive, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: They blow me away!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic quality. I was a bit worried that I've paid so much money for some airpods but once I've tried them on, I can say hand on heart that I was literally blown away. I absolutely love them and I regret I haven't bought them much earlier. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Iulian

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, but poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Like the headline says, good for playing music...if you're standing still. Headphones tend to fall out when moving about. Hard to find a comfortable fit. Not very good for making phone calls either as the previous/traditional AirPods. Case feels wonky and cheap and not as sturdy and solid as the gen 1 or 2's. I was very pleased with the first gen 1 AirPods I bought, but the pro version is simply not as good - especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, expensive but in my opinion Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I’m just scared of losing them. I bought this model as i don’t find the earpiece comfortable on the cheaper / normal Apple ones. Took me a while to get the controls sussed out. I like the voice activation and the Mic is good for calls even if you do look dull walking along talking to yourself! They produce a good, crisp sound and bass. Noise cancellation is great - I’ve used on a plane, train, working. A Lot of money but in my case I feel well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Michelle Caines

customer_reviews.title: The only earphones you need.
customer_reviews.text: Finally...earphones that tick all the boxes. Use with the ear hook accessory though which are about £10 on Amazon. They are locked in ears then and will not fall out (even during intense activities). Sound sick, look sick, locked in ears (with the ear hook accessory). Noise cancellation is insane. Syncs perfectly with my iPhone. I’ve tried and tested many earphones now, these are the best. Go pick some up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Almost magical
customer_reviews.text: Why do I like these? They are not the best sound, not the best noise cancelling, no volume control on the buds - but they are the simplest and best overall performer. For their size they are almost magical. If you are an Apple user - iPhone, MacBook - these. just. work. Get them.
customer_reviews.author: avl06

customer_reviews.title: Fab sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and in ear fit. A class apart from other AirPods. A bit expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: SJGF

customer_reviews.title: Prefer 2nd gen ordinary air pods
customer_reviews.text: These fitted well but don’t have full functionality on iPhone 6 . So I returned . And am getting the ordinary 2nd gen sir pods again which look and feel more solid . Classic design . Yes you do have watch out on a windy day but I prefer them
customer_reviews.author: jimmy2

customer_reviews.title: Sound amazing.... stability in ear when active not great
customer_reviews.text: I was very sceptical having been a Bose man for many years, although sound quality is amazing! The only reason I have given this 4 stars is I can see my losing one in the near future. If doing sports they do not stay in very well. Great for day to day listening of music and calls but just not in active situations.
customer_reviews.author: Danny O'Keeffe

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous is all I can say!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! What else is there to add. I found these Apple Airpod Pro so much better than the normal Airpod. The acoustic is great, they don't fall out of my ears. I can exercise without fear of loosing them. The microphone is excellent. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P.G.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive ...but good
customer_reviews.text: If i knew then what I know now i would not have got these. Rather go for a pair of AUKEY ear buds with ANC. Yes the ANC is not as good yet works very well an they cost £59!!! Makes you think about what you really need.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moore

customer_reviews.title: Simply Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is the first ever review I’ve put on Amazon, and I use Amazon A lot (First name terms with the local DPD driver), these EarPods from Apple are expensive, but worth every penny in my opinion, sound quality is amazing, ANC blocks out the world perfectly, for someone who spends half his life with headphones in, my hunt for headphones is now complete, They just work, simple as that, especially if you are connecting them to an iphone
customer_reviews.author: Grant W Finley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I kind of had to upgrade as my dog chewed on my AirPods haha. I love the sounds control with the noise cancelling function - it’s unreal how great it is! Very comfortable to wear and stays in the ears well. Another great innovation from Apple!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Apple AirPods Pro
feature_bullets: Active Noise cancellation for immersive sound
Transparency mode for hearing and connecting with the world around you
Three sizes of soft, tapered silicone tips for a customisable fit
Adaptive EQ automatically tunes music to the shape of your ear
Easy setup for all your Apple devices
Quick access to Siri by saying “Hey Siri”
The wireless charging case delivers more than 24 hours of battery life
